Description:
Detects a renamed "dctask64.exe" execution, a signed binary by ZOHO Corporation part of ManageEngine Endpoint Central.
This binary can be abused for DLL injection, arbitrary command and process execution.


Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Renamed ZOHO Dctask64 Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((hashes like '%6834b1b94e49701d77ccb3c0895e1afd%' or hashes like '%1bb6f93b129f398c7c4a76bb97450bba%' or hashes like '%faa2ac19875fade461c8d89dcf2710a3%' or hashes like '%f1039ced4b91572ab7847d26032e6bbf%') and  not process_path like '%\dctask64.exe')
